about_the_game:
In the year 20XX, the simulator developed by Non-Bald Technology was officially launched. This product can simulate a hundred days of exam preparation within a single day, assisting students in improving their scores.

Players will assume the role of a student who has just received the simulator. They will continuously refine their exam preparation strategy within the simulator.

Improve academic performance

Enhance memory, and absorb more knowledge into your mind!

Plan your daily routine

While studying is important, it's also crucial not to overwork yourself. Maintain your physical and mental well-being by planning proper rest and relaxation time every day!

Organize your backpack

Bring the necessary items and food, and make the most of every inch of space!

Maintain a balanced diet

A full stomach is essential for optimal learning!

Engage in regular physical exercise

Actively participate in sports and activities to keep your body energized!

Relax and unwind your mind

It is essential to strike a balance between work and rest!

name: The Road To Gaokao Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX (1GB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In "The Road To Gaokao" a roguelike card game, with only a hundred days left until the exam, how would you plan each day?
